testimonials.title: Client Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: Discover our clients' experiences and how we've helped improve their quality of life

client1.name: Um Mohamed
client1.content: The service was absolutely amazing! The nurses came to our home and treated my mother with such kindness. They checked on her daily and reassured us. My mother is doing much better now and feels happy at home.

client2.name: Ahmed Fathy
client2.content: I was hesitant at first because I had never tried such services before, but when I experienced the service, I was amazed! The doctors and nurses are excellent, understanding, and respectful. Now my blood pressure and diabetes are well controlled, thank God.

client3.name: Mona Hassan
client3.content: After my husband's surgery, I was very worried about him, but SanadHome team made me feel completely at ease. They were with us 24/7, and they treated him with tenderness and patience. My husband recovered well, thank God, and returned to his normal life.

client4.name: Uncle Hussein Abu El-Ezz
client4.content: I've been a kidney patient for years and needed special care and constant monitoring. Thank God I found all of this with SanadHome. These people, may God bless them, are trustworthy and specialized, allowing me to live normally at home with my family.

client5.name: Dr. Sarah Mahmoud
client5.content: Being a doctor myself, I was very particular about choosing who would care for my father after his stroke. SanadHome exceeded my expectations by far, and their professional level is very high. My father improved significantly, thank God, and can move again.

client6.name: Abu Kareem Al-Najjar
client6.content: After the heart attack I had, I needed continuous care and hourly monitoring. Thank God, this team was with me every step of the way. My health is much better now, and I feel secure knowing I'm in their safe hands.

client7.name: Hajja Um Abdullah
client7.content: My son has a chronic condition and needs special care and constant monitoring. SanadHome team became like family to us. They treat him with love and patience as if he were their own child, which improved his mental and physical health. May God bless them.

client8.name: Uncle Ragab Al-Halaq
client8.content: After the stroke that left me bedridden, I couldn't do anything alone. I was sad and worried about my future. But the nurses at SanadHome helped me get my life back with dignity. They are patient and skilled, I swear to God.

client9.name: Um Ahmed Al-Tayeba
client9.content: I'm an elderly woman with many health problems. I was sitting at home alone with no one to check on me. When SanadHome team came, I felt like I found my grown children. They come daily to see me and check on me. May God keep them for their families.

client10.name: Uncle Fathy Al-Bawab
client10.content: I'm a building doorman and have had diabetes for a long time. I didn't know how to deal with it. SanadHome team taught me everything and helped me understand my disease better. Now I know what to eat and what not to eat, and my health is much better.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services

cta.title: Still have questions?
cta.description: Our team is here to help. Contact us for more information about our services.

questions.question: What services do you provide?
questions.answer: We provide comprehensive home nursing care including medication management, wound care, vital sign monitoring, and personal care assistance.

questions.question: Are your nurses licensed?
questions.answer: Yes, all our nurses are fully licensed healthcare professionals with extensive experience in home healthcare.

questions.question: How do I schedule an appointment?
questions.answer: You can schedule an appointment by calling our hotline, using our online contact form, or visiting our office.

questions.question: Do you accept insurance?
questions.answer: We work with most major insurance providers. Please contact us to verify your coverage.

questions.question: What areas do you serve?
questions.answer: We currently serve major cities across Egypt. Contact us to confirm service availability in your area.

questions.question: Are services available 24/7?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide 24/7 emergency services and can arrange round-the-clock care when needed.

sections.title: 1. Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, request our services, or contact us for support. This may include:
items: Personal information (name, email address, phone number)
Medical information relevant to providing care services

sections.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use the information we collect to:
items: Provide, maintain, and improve our nursing services
Communicate with you about our services
Ensure the safety and security of our services

sections.title: 3. Information Sharing
sections.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy:
items: With healthcare providers as necessary for your care
With service providers who assist us in operating our services
When required by law or to protect rights and safety
In connection with a business transfer or acquisition

sections.title: 4. Data Security
sections.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

sections.title: 5. Your Rights
sections.content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You may also opt out of certain communications from us. To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided below.

sections.title: 6. Contact Us
sections.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at info@sanadhome.com or through our contact page.

sections.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing and using SanadHome services, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

sections.title: 2. Services Description
sections.content: SanadHome provides professional home nursing and healthcare services. Our services include but are not limited to:

sections.title: 3. Service Agreement
sections.content: All services are provided subject to a separate service agreement that outlines specific terms, conditions, and care plans tailored to individual patient needs.

sections.title: 4. Payment Terms
sections.content: Payment for services is due as specified in your service agreement. We accept various payment methods and work with insurance providers where applicable.

sections.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
sections.content: SanadHome's liability is limited to the extent permitted by law. We maintain appropriate professional insurance and follow all applicable healthcare regulations.

sections.title: 6. Privacy and Confidentiality
sections.content: We are committed to protecting your privacy and maintaining the confidentiality of your medical information in accordance with applicable privacy laws and regulations.

sections.title: 7. Contact Information
sections.content: For questions about these terms, please contact us at info@sanadhome.com or through our contact page.
